name: LONE D.E.P
description:
Lone D.E.P is a first person horror exploration game where the player control a robot named D.E.P 301 locked in a gloomy castle.

He will have to recover the memory cards on the others robots remains. D.E.P is not alone, in the darkness a monster is watching his prey.

This Itch.io file is not a game nor a demo but a Game Design Document.
